response.original_title: Black Christmas: The Night Billy Came Home
response.overview: Black Christmas: The Night Billy Came Home is a Black Christmas (1974) sequel, based in a world of reality where the sorority of Phi Kappa Sigma is being stalked and preyed upon an unknown killer.
response.tagline: Billy came home for Christmas, will you?
response.title: Black Christmas: The Night Billy Came Home
